actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 314(k) of title 38, United States Code, to provide for a special monthly payment to veterans who have lost a kidney as the result of a service-connected disability.

summary.text: Provides for a special monthly payment to veterans who have lost a kidney as the result of a service-connected disability. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 314 (k))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 314(k) of title 38, United States Code, to provide for a special monthly payment to veterans who have lost a kidney as the result of a service-connected disability.
